cards.detail: Remain calm and check your BP again following these instructions in 5 to 30 minutes. Read more about managing very high blood pressure in the link below.|[ { "id": "enter-bp-suggestion", "label": "Enter Blood Pressure", "type": "suggestion-link", "actions": [{"label":"Check your BP again (strongly recommended)", "url":"/vitals"}] } ]|at-most-one|[{"label":"American Heart Association: When to call 911 for high blood pressure", "url":"https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/high-blood-pressure/understanding-blood-pressure-readings/hypertensive-crisis-when-you-should-call-911-for-high-blood-pressure"}]
